name: Five Nights at Nikocado's
description:
Welcome to Nikocado Avocado's Mukbang Restaurant. We hope that you enjoy getting stuffed into a fursuit! 🥑🤭

Features:

  • Featuring: Nikocado, Monke (KraccBacc), Ned, Markiplier & Amogus.
  • Gameplay similar to FNaF Help Wanted, but 500% more funny.
  • 'Amogus' character, who can disable power if you overuse doors & lights.
  • Gratuitous amount of '21st century humor' sound effects.

Recommended System Requirements:

  • Windows 10
  • Intel i5 processor
  • 4GB RAM
  • Nvidia MX230 Graphics Card

Note for youtubers: if you make a let's play tag me so I can feature you in this page.
